name: Michael
Description: The best part of being a barber is the ever changing styles, methods & techniques that constantly evolve.  Michael embraces it all, staying up to date through constant training and watching the latest trends develop and grow.  Following a traditional style of barbering with a modern twist, he embraces the styles that are making a comeback.

name: Dani
Description: Dani joined the team in 2022 and has been popular with our clients.  Amazing with a set of clippers Dani enjoys modern styles and loves the opportunity to add a bit of colour too!Although she enjoys modern styles that doesn't mean she can't turn her scissors to amore traditional cut.

name: Simon
Description: Simon is a top class barber with experience working in some of the top barber shops in London.  He has a passion for the industry that shines through in his work. He is the perfect fit for our shop, combining traditional with modern styles.
